Articles.Content:
You would understand he said "what to do if it wasn't in Russia" (excuse my terrible understanding of Russian )

What if there was a universal language?

We would all speak English.

What if you were in this situation:

I would take my boots off and run out of the mud barefoot. I would then take everything except my shorts off and wrestle a bear.

What if Spongebob never existed?

Edited August 1, 2014 by Souper

Then the Loch-Ness vampire wouldn't exist either.

What if the Earth orbited the Sun and not the other way around? O_O

Then you would ask the opposite question.

What if the K-PRIZE was for covering ever metre of Kerbin's land surface with 2 rovers?

Then I'd look for a mod that allows controlling 2 crafts on different locations.

What if the Earth wasn't flat??? :-O

Then columbus would be famous!

why? just cause!

on that note, what if just cause 3 never came out!

Not even Scott Manley could do it! So that would be impossible. If Scott Manley can do it, or Danny2462 can glitch it, it's possible.

PLEASE stop ninja'ing me!

Then Valve would be happier.

What if Danny2462 controlled the universe?

Then for asking the question "What if the lord Danny didn't control the universe?" You would become the host of the kraken.

What if there were multiple greens?

There ARE multiple greens.

What if everyone liked mud?

Then disease would spread faster.

What if the rapture was today.

No one would know what that is. Oh wait, that's already true.

What if everyone spoke English?

Everyone could understand each other

What if SQUAD was Bought by Blizzard Entertainment.

Blizzard Entertainment would have a bunch of marketers with nothing to do.

Srsly. Squad is a marketing company.

What if there was a button on the keyboard for double enter?

Then

This

Would

Be

Easier.

What if there was a button on the keyboard to type the euro symbol 88 times?

Idk, because I don't live in Europe. USA FTW!

What if you were in this situation:

I would give up and leave.

What if there was a new website, YTP, which made ytp's of all YT videos?

Then there would be an equivalent that made YTMDs of all of those.

What if I lived in Canada rather than the United States?

You would have free healthcare. OOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHH (Linescrew1 reference - watch his youtube videos)

What if Facebook didn't exist?

I would not be mad.

What if the we made everything powered by nuclear fission?

Humans would be all gone.

What if someone possessed all the money on earth.
What if we made everything powered by nuclear fusion?
People would die from radioactive waste. What if all our posts contained this at the end?

Everyone will die from awesomeness.

What if pony?

Please be more clear.

What if 102,101,100 was the population of the U.S.?
